tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crop_rotation_practices (
    plot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    season INT,
    crop_name VARCHAR,
    planting_date DATE,
    harvest_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE plot_details (
    plot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR,
    soil_type VARCHAR,
    terrain_type VARCHAR,
    plot_size FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE crop_rotation (
    plot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    season_id INT,
    crop_name VARCHAR(255),
    rotation_start_date DATE,
    rotation_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE rotation (
  rotation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  plot_id UUID,
  crop_id UUID,
  season INTEGER,
  harvest_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE seasons (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    season_number INT,
    year INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE crop_history (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT,
    season_id INT,
    yield FLOAT,
    quality VARCHAR(255)
);
